sections.heading: 01|Grand jury definitions.Effective:October 1, 1953Latest Legislation:House Bill 1 - 100th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFThe definition of "magistrate" set forth in section2931
sections.text: 01of the Revised Code applies to Chapter 2939. of the Revised Code.

sections.heading: 28, inclusive, of the Revised Code shall be so interpreted and construed as to effectuate their general purpose, to make the law of this state uniform with the law of other states which enact similar uniform legislation
